TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 150
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Adner Kuykendall, 12-03-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Abner Kuykendall, December 3, 1828. Wishing to buy cows and calves.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 150

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Abner Kuykendall, December 3, 1828. Wishing to buy cows and calves.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Abner Kykendall*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Please let*person_mentioned* Mr. Achilles McFarlan*/person_mentioned* have four Cows and calves out of those you intend for me.*/p* *p*I will take all the Cows and calves you have to spare but cannot go up now to receive them and must start *location_mentioned*down the River*/location_mentioned* tomorrow, I will send up my *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*to attend to the business and receive the cows-*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="12-03-1828">Decr. 3, 1828.*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Stephen F. Austin.]*/p* *p*order for four cows*/p*
*p*Received of *person_mentioned*Abner C Kuykendall*/person_mentioned* fore Cows at one hundred dollars *person_mentioned*Achilles McFarlan*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
